com.samsung.android.sdk.accessoryfiletransfer

Class SAFileTransfer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.accessoryfiletransfer.SAFileTransfer

  • public class SAFileTransfer
extends Object
    This class provides the Accessory File Transfer Service implementation. To access the Accessory File Transfer methods, you must acquire an instance of this class. You must also define a BroadcastReceiver for the ACTION_SAP_FILE_TRANSFER_REQUESTED action on the file receiver side for the files to be received.

    To acquire an instance of this class, you must have an SAAgent implementation and a SAFileTransfer.EventListener implementation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SAFileTransfer.EventListener
      This listener interface receives file transfer update events.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ACTION_SAP_FILE_TRANSFER_REQUESTED
      Intent action defined for the broadcast receiver to receive incoming file transfer requests.
      static int ERROR_CHANNEL_IO
      File transfer failed because the Samsung Accessory Service Framework failed to send or receive the file.
      static int ERROR_COMMAND_DROPPED
      File transfer failed because a request was made in an invalid state.
      static int ERROR_CONNECTION_LOST
      File transfer failed because the connection with the connected peer was lost.
      static int ERROR_FILE_IO
      File transfer failed because file reading or writing failed.
      static int ERROR_NONE
      File transfer succeeded.
      static int ERROR_PEER_AGENT_BUSY
      File transfer failed because the file receiver was already busy receiving another file.
      static int ERROR_PEER_AGENT_NO_RESPONSE
      File transfer failed because the connected peer was not responding.
      static int ERROR_PEER_AGENT_REJECTED
      File transfer failed because the connected peer rejected or cancelled the file transfer.
      static int ERROR_REQUEST_NOT_QUEUED
      File transfer failed because the Samsung Accessory Service Framework failed to queue the file transfer request, possibly because the file transfer peer could not be found or the peer found has a different accessory id than the one provided by the user.
      static int ERROR_SPACE_NOT_AVAILABLE
      File transfer failed because the connected peer did not have enough free space available.

    • Field Detail

      • ERROR_NONE

        public static final int ERROR_NONE
        File transfer succeeded.
        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        SAFileTransfer.EventListener.onTransferCompleted(int, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_REQUEST_NOT_QUEUED

        public static final int ERROR_REQUEST_NOT_QUEUED
        File transfer failed because the Samsung Accessory Service Framework failed to queue the file transfer request, possibly because the file transfer peer could not be found or the peer found has a different accessory id than the one provided by the user. The sender application should not retry sending the file in this case.

        Constant Value: -1 (0xFFFFFFFF)

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_CHANNEL_IO

        public static final int ERROR_CHANNEL_IO
        File transfer failed because the Samsung Accessory Service Framework failed to send or receive the file.

        Constant Value: 1 (0x00000001)

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        SAFileTransfer.EventListener.onTransferCompleted(int, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_PEER_AGENT_NO_RESPONSE

        public static final int ERROR_PEER_AGENT_NO_RESPONSE

        Constant Value: 4 (0x00000004)

        2.0.19
        See Also:
        SAFileTransfer.EventListener.onTransferCompleted(int, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_CONNECTION_LOST

        public static final int ERROR_CONNECTION_LOST
        File transfer failed because the connection with the connected peer was lost. In this case the sender application should check if the accessory has been detached or not. If yes, it should not retry sending the file.

        Constant Value: 5 (0x00000005)

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        SAFileTransfer.EventListener.onTransferCompleted(int, String, int), Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_PEER_AGENT_BUSY

        public static final int ERROR_PEER_AGENT_BUSY
        File transfer failed because the file receiver was already busy receiving another file.

        Constant Value: 8 (0x00000008)

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ERROR_PEER_AGENT_REJECTED

        public static final int ERROR_PEER_AGENT_REJECTED
        File transfer failed because the connected peer rejected or cancelled the file transfer.

        Constant Value: 9 (0x00000009)

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:

      • ERROR_SPACE_NOT_AVAILABLE

        public static final int ERROR_SPACE_NOT_AVAILABLE
        File transfer failed because the connected peer did not have enough free space available.

        Constant Value: 11 (0x0000000B)

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_SAP_FILE_TRANSFER_REQUESTED

        public static final String ACTION_SAP_FILE_TRANSFER_REQUESTED
        Intent action defined for the broadcast receiver to receive incoming file transfer requests. The receiver must be registered in the receiving application's manifest.

        Constant Value: "com.samsung.accessory.ftconnection"

        Since:
        2.0.19
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • SAFileTransfer

        public SAFileTransfer(SAAgent callingAgent,
              SAFileTransfer.EventListener eventListener)
        Creates an SAFileTransfer instance with the specified SAAgent and SAFileTransfer.EventListener instances.
        Parameters:
        callingAgent - The SAAgent instance of the calling application.
        eventListener - The listener instance
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if any of the parameters passed are null.
        Since:
        2.0.19

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public int send(SAPeerAgent peerAgent,
       String source)
        Send a file to a connected peer. The file is sent asynchronously by the Accessory File Transfer implementation on its own. The source path MUST be a public visible folder, such as /mnt/sdcard.
        Parameters:
        peerAgent - The remote peer agent to receive the file.
        source - The file path.
        Returns:
        Transaction ID Transaction ID of the file transfer request. Returns -1 if the request could not be processed as the app's data was cleared. User should re-register the application in this case.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the file path passed is invalid, the file does not exist in the specified path, the file size is zero, or the peer agent passed is null.
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • receive

        public void receive(int transactionId,
           String path)
        Accept a file transfer.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The transaction ID given by the Accessory File Transfer Service
        path - The path where the file is stored.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the file path or transaction ID passed is invalid.
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • reject

        public void reject(int transactionId)
        Reject a file transfer.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The transaction ID given by the File Transfer Service utility.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the transaction ID passed is invalid.
        Since:
        2.0.19

      • cancel

        public void cancel(int transactionId)
        Cancel an ongoing file transfer. Both the sender and receiver of the file can call this method.
        Parameters:
        transactionId - The transaction ID of the file transfer request
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the transaction ID passed is invalid
        Since:
        2.0.19
